title: AMAZING LOCATION--WATER VIEW--FREE AMENITIES--
posting_body: ['AMAZING LOCATION--WATER VIEW--FREE AMENITIES--', 'Listing ID #: 212873', 'Price: $3,250', 'Property Type: Condo', 'Bedrooms: 2.0', 'Bathrooms: 1.0', 'Pets: Pets OK', 'Apartment Amenities', 'City View', 'Dishwasher', 'Granite Kitchen', 'High Ceilings', 'Light', 'Marble Bath', 'Open View', 'Renovated', 'River View', 'Amazing opportunity Best deal by far -This convertible Two bedrooms apartment .', 'Features a beautiful all new kitchen with large black granite counters, stainless steel appliances and overhead track lighting.', 'Wood floors run throughout.', 'History meets modern-day allure in Fidi, the mecca of finance, commerce and technology located on the tip of Manhattan.', 'Among sweeping vistas of the Brooklyn Bridge and New York Harbor, architecturally distinct buildings from yesteryear have been beautifully refurbished and are complemented by luxury residential high rises BUILDING AMENITIES Bike Room Concierge Garage Parking Gym Laundry in Building Live-in', 'Super Media Room Community Recreation Facilities Storage Available LISTING AMENITIES Dishwasher OUTDOOR SPACE Roof Deck.', "BETTER CALL MARCO TO SCHEDULE A PRIVATE VIEWING THIS AMAZING OPPORTUNITY WON'T LAST MOBILE 917-353-3448 EMAIL", '<URL> TEXT FOR FASTER RESPONSE', 'Marco Bianchi', 'Phone: 9173533448', 'Mobile: 9173533448', 'Email: <URL>', 'The Bouklis Group \xa0 9173533448 \xa0 9173533448 \xa0 <URL>', 'POSTED BY REALTYMX™', 'To view, call or text Marco Bianchi at 9173533448']
